text: Sered lyudey ye taki, yaki hovoryatʹ: «My uviruvaly v Allaha!» Ale shchoyno vony postrazhdayutʹ zarady Allaha, to spryymayutʹ lyudsʹku spokusu za karu vid Allaha. Ta yakshcho pryyde peremoha vid Hospoda tvoho, vony skazhutʹ: «My buly z vamy!» Khiba Allah ne krashche znaye te, shcho khovayetʹsya v sertsyakh zhyteliv svitiv
